title: Practical Competency Enhancement Course through Metacognitive Tutoring System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital educational tools and foundational knowledge in language learning
context.additional_context: A course focused on enhancing language learning efficiency through metacognitive strategies for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core design principles of a metacognitive tutoring system.
Learners can perform language tasks while applying metacognitive strategies (self-questioning, monitoring, evaluation) with over 80% accuracy in real-time online environments.
Through project-based assessment, learners can design a metacognitive tutoring system proposal and incorporate peer feedback three or more times.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
